3rd Seaside City Festival - Shore Leave Bremerhaven

Big happenings from May 24th - 27th, 2018

  • Programme
  • Maritim Highlights 2017
  • Shore leave, Ahoy! 2017
  • Ships, ships, ships 2017
  • How to get there
  • Contact & Organization

Lots of windjammers to look and feel along with a colorful program in the Havenwelten Bremerhaven on land and at sea are the exciting ingredients of the new big maritime event "Seaside City Festival – Shore Leave Bremerhaven" which will take place for the third time in Bremerhaven from May 24th - 27th, 2018. The Seaside City's retail partners will also participate in this event with Sunday shopping. Original acrobats, street food and maritime crafts can also be enjoyed and experienced. A diverse music program as well as lots of activities for children complement the eventful festival days. Yet, the real stars of this event are the big and small ships under sails or motorized.

A hearty welcome to the Seaside City of Bremerhaven!
